subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|alt=𠍲-pronoun,佢-pronoun (dialectal),伊-pronoun (S. Sixian Hakka; Shanghainese),洰-second round simplified}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “ditch; canal; drain”
: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*r-ka ~ *k(r)a||path; way; channel; ditch}}; probably the same word as {{och-l|衢|passage}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Cognate with {{cog|bo|རྐ||gutter; channel; furrow}}. {{attn|zh|Schuessler/STEDT also relates this to 柜, but 柜 doesn't mean "gutter", but 行馬}}
; third-person pronoun
: Attested since 4th to 5th century {{CE}}, preserved in many central and southern dialects ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). See {{zh-l|*佢}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=qú
|c=keoi5,heoi5,keoi4

|c-t=kui1
|g=qie2
|h=pfs=kì/s:yì;gd=gi2
|mn=xm:kû/qz:kîr/zz:kî
|mn-t=ke5
|w=3hhi
|mc=y
|ma=y
|cat=pron
}}
